DataElement.preferredName: Patient Malignant Anal Neoplasm Diagnosis Other Diagnostic Procedure Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the free text field to specify the other diagnostic procedure used to diagnose a malignant anal neoplasm.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Malignant Anal Neoplasm Diagnosis Other Diagnostic Procedure
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to the diagnosis, through use of other diagnostic procedures, of a malignant anal neoplasm (cancer), carcinomas that arise from the anus and include anal canal and anal margin (perianal skin) carcinomas.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.:Cancer relating to the anus.  Tumors of the anal margin (below the anal verge and involving the perianal hair-bearing skin) are classified with skin tumors.:The process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
A primary or metastatic malignant neoplasm that affects the anal canal or perianal skin.  Representative examples include carcinomas, lymphomas, and melanomas.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

Property.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Methods, procedures, and tests performed to diagnose disease, disordered function, or disability.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Any procedure or test to diagnose a disease or disorder.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field to specify the assessment performed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.
